text:
BriteVerify integration (for Lead Capture via Forms). I'd love to flip a switch and it run.

On that note, if HS has an email verification system, can someone link me docs? If anyone is running BV + HS, can you let me know? :slightly_smiling_face:
Can we have a Design Manager certification?
That actually previously had that basically
It evolved into the new CMS Developer certification which is actually a better indicator of knowlege/skill
I don't want to do websites though
I assume it covers both things without specific knowledge of web or email building?
